fields.name: HTTPSCACert
fields.description: Base64-encoded HTTPS certificate authority contents used to access git private git repositories over HTTPS

fields.name: HTTPSUser
fields.description: Plaintext HTTPS username used to access private git repositories over HTTPS

fields.name: LocalAuthRef
fields.description: Name of a local secret on the Kubernetes cluster to use as the authentication secret rather than the managed or user-provided configuration secrets.

fields.name: RepositoryRef
fields.description: The source reference for the GitRepository object.

fields.name: SshKnownHosts
fields.description: Base64-encoded known_hosts value containing public SSH keys required to access private git repositories over SSH

fields.name: SyncIntervalInSeconds
fields.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the cluster git repository source with the remote.

fields.name: TimeoutInSeconds
fields.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the cluster git repository source with the remote.

fields.name: Url
fields.description: The URL to sync for the flux configuration git repository.
